Package com.ibm.fhir.database.utils.db2

Class Db2Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.fhir.database.utils.db2.Db2Translator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseTranslator
    public class Db2Translator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatabaseTranslator
    Handles translation of statements/fragments etc specific to DB2
